wikipedia_page.main: The Honorable Henry Arnold Lawrence (17 March 1848 – 18 April 1902) was a rugby union forward who played club rugby for Richmond F.C. and international rugby for England. He was the third captain of the England rugby team.

response: * Henry Arnold Lawrence (1848–1902), English rugby union player
*Henry Arnold Lawrence (1848–1902) England International Rugby player and captain
